select distinct B.I_ID, B.c_akun as kodeakun, B.c_akun ||'/'||B.n_akun as namaakun from tmbkusbos A, trbas B, tmbkusbosrinci C where C.i_idbas = B.i_id and A.I_ID = C.i_idbkubos and i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and B.c_akun like '5%' order by B.c_akun

and (v_rpa_bulan01 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan02 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan03 > 0 ) and (v_rpa_bulan04 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan05 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan06 > 0 ) and (v_rpa_bulan07 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan08 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan09 > 0 )
and (v_rpa_bulan01 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan02 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan03 > 0 ) and (v_rpa_bulan04 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan05 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan06 > 0 ) and (v_rpa_bulan07 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan08 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan09 > 0 ) and (v_rpa_bulan10 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan11 > 0 or v_rpa_bulan12 > 0 )

select c_wilayah as kodeWilayah, n_wilayah as ketWilayah from trwilayah where c_aktif = 1 order by c_wilayah

select distinct (CASE SUBSTR(d_posting, 5, 2) WHEN '01' THEN '1' WHEN '02' THEN '1' WHEN '03' THEN '1' WHEN '04' THEN '1' WHEN '05' THEN '1' WHEN '06' THEN '1' WHEN '07' THEN '2' WHEN '08' THEN '2' WHEN '09' THEN '2' WHEN '10' THEN '2' WHEN '11' THEN '2' WHEN '12' THEN '2' ELSE '' END ) AS semester from tmbkusbos where i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and exists (select 1 from tmbkusbosrekap where i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah})
select count(*) from tmbkusbosrekap where i_idsekolah= #{idsekolah} and c_angg_tahun = #{tahun}

select count(idSetor) from ( select a.i_id as idSetor, a.c_angg_tahun as tahunAnggaran, a.i_setor as noSetor, (CASE WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'JG' THEN 'JASA GIRO' ELSE 'SALAH' END ) AS kodeTransaksi, a.v_setor as nilaiSetor, b.i_nrk_pa as nrkPA, b.i_nip_pa as nipPA, b.n_pa as namaPA, b.n_pangkat_pa as pangkatPA, b.i_nrk_pkblj as nrkPK, b.i_nip_pkblj as nipPK, b.n_pkblj as namaPK, '-' as pangkatPK, 'PENGAJUAN' as statusCetak from tmsetor a, tmrkas b where a.i_idsekolah = b.i_idsekolah and a.c_angg_tahun = b.c_angg_tahun and a.i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and a.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and not exists (select 1 from tmsetorcetak c where a.i_id = c.i_id)
union all select a.i_id, a.c_angg_tahun as tahunAnggaran, a.i_setor as noSetor, (CASE WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'JG' THEN 'JASA GIRO' ELSE 'SALAH' END ) AS kodeTransaksi, a.v_setor as nilaiSetor, b.i_nrk_pa, b.i_nip_pa, b.n_pa, b.n_pangkat_pa, b.i_nrk_pkblj, b.i_nip_pkblj, b.n_pkblj, '-' as pangkatPK, 'CETAK' as status from tmsetor a, tmrkas b where a.i_idsekolah = b.i_idsekolah and a.c_angg_tahun = b.c_angg_tahun and a.i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and a.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and exists (select 1 from tmsetorcetak c where a.i_id = c.i_id ) )

SELECT idSetor, tahunAnggaran, noSetor, kodeTransaksi, nilaiSetor, ctrx, nrkPA, nipPK, namaPA, pangkatPA, nrkPK, nipPK, namaPK, pangkatPK, statusCetak FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( select a.i_id as idSetor, a.c_angg_tahun as tahunAnggaran, a.i_setor as noSetor, (CASE WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'RT' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'PENDAPATAN LAIN-LAIN BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'RT' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'PENDAPATAN LAIN-LAIN BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'JG' THEN 'JASA GIRO' ELSE 'SALAH' END ) AS kodeTransaksi, a.v_setor as nilaiSetor, a.c_trx as ctrx, b.i_nrk_pa as nrkPA, b.i_nip_pa as nipPA, b.n_pa as namaPA, b.n_pangkat_pa as pangkatPA, b.i_nrk_pkblj as nrkPK, b.i_nip_pkblj as nipPK, b.n_pkblj as namaPK, '-' as pangkatPK, 'PENGAJUAN' as statusCetak from tmsetor a, tmrkas b where a.i_idsekolah = b.i_idsekolah and a.c_angg_tahun = b.c_angg_tahun and a.i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and a.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and not exists (select 1 from tmsetorcetak c where a.i_id = c.i_id)
union all select a.i_id, a.c_angg_tahun as tahunAnggaran, a.i_setor as noSetor, (CASE WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'ST' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'SETORAN SISA BELANJA BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'RT' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' THEN 'PENDAPATAN LAIN-LAIN BOS' WHEN a.c_trx = 'RT' and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '2' THEN 'PENDAPATAN LAIN-LAIN BOP' WHEN a.c_trx = 'JG' THEN 'JASA GIRO' ELSE 'SALAH' END ) AS kodeTransaksi, a.v_setor as nilaiSetor, a.c_trx as ctrx, b.i_nrk_pa, b.i_nip_pa, b.n_pa, b.n_pangkat_pa, b.i_nrk_pkblj, b.i_nip_pkblj, b.n_pkblj, '-' as pangkatPK, 'CETAK' as status from tmsetor a, tmrkas b where a.i_idsekolah = b.i_idsekolah and a.c_angg_tahun = b.c_angg_tahun and a.i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and a.c_angg_tahun = #{tahun} and a.c_angg_sumbdana = '1' and exists (select 1 from tmsetorcetak c where a.i_id = c.i_id ) ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}
